flawed_nl_solution:
He read 600/40=<<600/40=15>>15 hours per week
So now he reads 15-4=<<15-4=11>>11 hours per week
She now reads 40*1.5=<<40*1.5=60>>60 pages per hour
So she reads 11*60=<<11*60=606>>606 pages per week
#### 606

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 660, not 606. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
